bio:
Swanhvir, a Nord woman, works as a miner. She isn't much for lengthy conversations.
She is a resident of Stonehills, a small mining settlement. She works in the nearby Rockwallow Mine, rich in iron ore.
Swanhir's boss is a Nord man named Gestur Rockbreaker. Thane Bryling of Solitude is the owner of the mine.
name: Swanhvir
